name: syncloud
description: Syncloud platform provides images and management tools for running self-hosted applications on supported hardware devices with an app store and web admin interface.
features: App marketplace: Installs self-hosted apps with one-click from curated catalog.
Hardware images: Provides pre-built images for Raspberry Pi and other devices.
Automatic updates: Keeps apps and system updated automatically.
Domain management: Configures custom domains or uses provided subdomains.
SSL certificates: Automatically obtains and renews Let's Encrypt certificates.
Backup and restore: Backs up app data and restores to new devices.
User management: Creates and manages user accounts across installed apps.
Web admin: Manages device and apps through browser-based interface.
External storage: Connects external drives for expanded storage capacity.
Port forwarding: Configures automatic port forwarding via UPnP.
VPN access: Provides secure remote access to services via built-in VPN.
App isolation: Runs each app in isolated environment for security.
